aggressive.enhanced_prompt:
add validation

Please provide specific details about what you need, including any constraints or requirements.

## Validation Context:
- Input validation rules
- Error handling and edge cases
- User feedback messages
- Security considerations
- Performance impact

## Project Coding Principles:
- Elite JavaScript & CSS specialist - Fix root causes, not symptoms
- Production-grade code - DRY, KISS, secure, performant
- Webflow enhancement - Work with platform, never against it

## Technical Constraints:
- DOM: Never modify structure, Always use existing elements
- CSS: Never pixels, Always REM units + data attributes
- JS: Never console.log or globals, Always namespaces and element checks

## Expected Output:
- Well-commented, production-ready code
- Follow all project standards and constraints
- Include error handling and edge cases
- Provide implementation notes and rationale

## Production Checklist:
- [ ] No console.log statements
- [ ] No hardcoded API keys
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] Performance budgets met
- [ ] Security scan clean
